context.content: Hi Im good and you? What kind of movies do you like?
I’m great :) I’m open but I really enjoy comedy amen actionwhat about you? And*
Im with you! I like anything! Have you seen Jumanji (2017)
Noo! Not yet I just never got around to seeing it but I heard Its great!
It really is! If you enjoy comedy and action, I think you'll love it. Would you like some recommendations for similar movies?

I appreciate the offer, but I’m really interested in a film that combines humor with a unique take on the superhero genre. It features a character who breaks the fourth wall and has a very unconventional approach to heroism. It’s quite entertaining and has a lot of memorable moments!

I would recommend the following items: 1: Superhero Movie (2008)
2: Super (2010)
3: Avenger (2006)
4: Superman (1997)
5: Ant-Man (2015)
6: Wonder Woman (1974)
7: The Avengers (1998)
8: Kick-Ass
9: Supersonic Man (1979)
10: Wonder Woman (2009)
11: Batman (1966)
12: Wonder Woman (2017)
13: Marvel Super Heroes 4D
14: Batman: Revenge (2003)
15: The Dark Knight Trilogy
16: The Interview (2014)
17: Tropic Thunder (2008)
18: Justice League Dark
19: Lego Batman: The Movie – DC Super Heroes Unite
20: Attack the Block
21: Wonder Woman 2 (2019)
22: The Lego Batman Movie (2017)
23: Fanboys (2009)
24: The Incredible Hulk (2008)
25: Deadpool (2016)
26: Guardians of the Galaxy (2014)
27: Suicide Squad (2016)
28: Thor: Ragnarok (2017)
29: Big Hero 6 (2014)
30: Sky High (2003)
31: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
32: Kick-Ass (2010)

34: The Fantastic Four
35: Hancock (2008)
36: The Comedy (2012)
37: Watchmen (2009)
38: Get Smart (2008)
39: Spider-Man 2 (2004)
40: Fantastic Four (2015)
41: The Sorcerer's Apprentice (2010)
42: Spider-Man (2002)
43: Last Action Hero (1993)
44: Avengers Grimm (2015)
45: Superfast! (2015)
46: Pan (2015)
47: Defendor (2009)
48: Thor
49: Captain America
50: Batman
:It sounds like you're describing "Deadpool"! If you're looking for more films that combine humor with action and a unique take on the superhero genre, I can recommend some. Would you like that?

Absolutely! The film I'm thinking of features a witty anti-hero who often breaks the fourth wall, providing a fresh and humorous perspective on the superhero genre. It's packed with action, clever dialogue, and a unique storyline that sets it apart from traditional superhero films. If you enjoy a blend of comedy and action, this one is definitely worth watching!

simulator_dialog.resp: It so funny you have to see it! Kevin Hart is great! What about Deadpool (2016)
